column4: I also tried brining my wireless card up with ifconfig, no luck, I tried rfkill unblock all, still no luck.  The button still doesn't seem to work to enable wireless
do you have an internal broadcom card?

I had the same problem when I upgraded my kernel a few versions back. Still have not gotten it to work. Bought a usb wifi and it fixed the problem. I reinstalled with the 12.04 cd and it fixed the problem but the minute i ran all the upgrades it stopped working again. Still working on it. Sorry.
